Class Triangle

  • java.lang.Object
    • Triangle
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    java.lang.Cloneable, java.lang.Comparable<Shape>, Shape

    public class Triangle
extends java.lang.Object
implements Shape, java.lang.Cloneable
    A simple Triangle class that implements shape methods.
    Author:
    Yusuf Can
